function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inclusion of multiple voices and perspectives in the commentary may lead to the propagation of conflicting information about COVID-19.","Impact":"Confusion and misinformation about COVID-19 could increase, leading to potential public health risks.","Mitigation":"Clear fact-checking and verification of information before inclusion in the commentary. Providing context and multiple perspectives to mitigate the impact of conflicting information.","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, audio editing software for contextualizing quotes, and information verification platforms.","People":"Listeners of the podcast and readers of the commentary.","Owner":"Authors of the commentary and podcast contributors."}]}
